product_overview: FinControl is a modern web application for personal financial management enabling users to track finances, view detailed reports, set saving goals, and make informed financial decisions with an intuitive and secure platform.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive and easy-to-use interface for managing personal finances.
Enable users to track income, expenses, and transactions effectively with powerful filtering and categorization.
Offer comprehensive financial dashboards and reports with visualizations to aid decision-making.
Allow users to set and track savings goals with progress visualization.
Ensure data security and privacy through robust authentication and authorization mechanisms.
Support export of financial data in multiple formats for backup and analysis.
Provide subscription plans including a free and premium tier with checkout integration.
Maintain high performance, accessibility, and responsiveness across devices.
key_features: Complete Authentication System with login, registration, email verification, password reset, and JWT token management.
Dashboard displaying financial overview, interactive charts, recent transactions, and quick actions.
Transaction Management with CRUD operations, advanced filters, recurring transactions, and virtual scrolling for performance.
Category Management allowing custom income and expense categories with icons, emojis, and colors.
Comprehensive Financial Reports featuring charts, tables, and data export options including PDF and Excel.
Savings Goal module to create, track progress, and manage deadlines of savings targets.
User Settings for profile management, theme preferences, notifications, and account security.
Data Export functionality supporting JSON, CSV, Excel, and PDF formats with filtering capabilities.
Secure Account Deletion process with OTP verification and data cleanup.
Subscription Management with plan selection, subscription checkout, and management.
Real-time Notification System with dropdown and management.
Built-in Financial Calculators for percentage and compound interest calculations.
Admin Panel for system and user management.
Theme System supporting Dark and Light modes with context provider.
user_flow_summary: User registers and verifies email through the authentication system.
User logs in and is directed to the Dashboard showing an overview of finances.
User creates, edits, and deletes transactions with categories and filters applied.
User manages income and expense categories with custom icons and colors.
User views detailed financial reports and exports data as needed.
User sets, tracks, and adjusts savings goals with progress feedback.
User manages profile settings, preferences, and engages with notification system.
User subscribes to premium plans and manages subscriptions through integrated checkout.
User uses financial calculators for precise financial planning.
User can delete account securely using OTP verification followed by data cleanup.
validation_criteria: All authentication flows including registration, login, email verification, password reset, and token management work securely and reliably.
Financial dashboard loads data quickly and visualizations display correctly.
Transaction management supports CRUD with validation and performant virtual scrolling.
Category customization persists correctly with icon, emoji, and color selections.
Financial reports generate accurate data visualizations and export files are correctly formatted.
Savings goals track progress accurately and notify users appropriately.
User settings save changes persistently and reflect in UI including theme changes.
Data export produces files in requested formats with correct filtered data.
Account deletion requires OTP validation and removes all user data securely.
Subscription processes complete successfully with proper plan handling.
Notifications are delivered in real-time and can be managed through UI.
Financial calculators return correct results with various input scenarios.
Admin panel features restrict access properly and provide required system controls.
Dark and Light theme toggle functions correctly across the application.
